title: POCO M4 Pro 5G (Cool Blue, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, 33W Power Adapter, USB Type A-C Cable, Sim Ejector Tool, Transparent Case, Pre-Applied Screen Protector, User Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Hi Res Audio Certified for Headphones
product_specification.Other Display Features: In-Cell IPS Dot Display with 90 Hz Dynamic Refresh Rate, 240 Hz Touch Sampling Rate, Aspect Ratio: 20:9, Contrast Ratio: 1500:1, NTSC Ratio: Supports DCI-P3 Color Gamut, Screen Mirror/ Cast: Yes
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8, 4G FDD LTE: B1/B3/B5/B7/B8, 4G TDD LTE: B40/B41, 5G SA: N1/N3/N5/N8/N28/N40/N78, 5G NSA: N1/N3/N40/N78
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Dual Camera Setup: 50MP (f/1.8 Aperture, Pixel Size: 0.64um (4-in-1: 12.5MP, 1.28um)) + 8MP Ultra Wide Camera (f/2.2 Aperture, Pixel Size: 1.0um, FOV: 118 Degree,Phase Detection Auto Focus), Camera Feature: HDR, AI Portrait Mode, Pro Mode, AI Scene Detection, Night Mode, Short Video, Slow Motion, Time Lapse, Panorama, AI Watermark
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP Camera Setup: (f/2.45 Aperture, Pixel Size: 1.0um), Camera Feature: HDR, AI Portrait Mode, Screen Flash, Selfie Timer, Portrait Selfies, Palm Shutter
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080p (at 60 fps) | Front Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, E-Compass, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Fingerprint Scanner
product_specification.Other Features: Fingerprint Scanner Position: Side Mounted (Power Key), Face Unlock, Dual App Support, Standby Time (4G): 430 Hours, 33W MMT Fast Charging, Corning Gorilla Glass 3, 6 GB + 2 GB Turbo RAM, IR Blaster, Dual Stereo Speakers, Dual Mic (Primary & Secondary), Body: Plastic Back
product_specification.Warranty Summary: One Year for Handset, 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Impeccable processor: With 6 GB of RAM, a 6 nm Mediatek Dimensity 810 processor clocked at 2.4 GHz, and UFS 2.2 WriteBooster the POCO M4 Pro 5G is built for outstanding performance, whether it's for work, gaming, or watching movies. This phone also features Turbo RAM that converts the unused memory into RAM to deliver a flawless operation.
product_description.Dashing Design: This phone's innovative design is sleek and appealing, making it difficult for people to look away. This phone is positive about marking your style statement.
product_description.Dapper Display: The POCO M4 Pro 5G has a 16.76 cm (6.6) Smart display with a 90 Hz refresh rate and a 240 Hz touch sampling rate. While playing games, surfing the internet, streaming movies, and other activities, the display gives a fluid visual experience. To provide optimum battery life, the smart display alternates between refresh rates based on usage. Furthermore, the display features a DCI P3 colour spectrum for a fantastic viewing experience.
product_description.Robust Battery: This phone has a massive 5000 mAh battery that lasts up to two days on a single charge. It also has a 33 W rapid charging interface with MMT technology, which allows you to charge your phone up to 100% in under 60 minutes without overheating it. This allows you to work more effectively while enjoying the phone's smooth functionality.
product_description.Picture Perfect: This phone features a 50 MP dual camera configuration driven by AI and an 8 MP Ultrawide sensor, as well as a variety of settings such as Kaleidoscope, Night mode, Slow-motion, Time-Lapse, and more. It also has a 16 MP front camera for those of you who like taking stunning selfies.

review: Amazing Smartphone, processor performance exceeded my expectations. Battery life is also outstanding, with heavy duty apps I m able to run the phone for almost 24 hours. I did not expected much from cameras, but it got an above average quality and I would recommend this phone for gamers as well.
Best phone. This phone has Smart look with powerful soul ... It is a all rounder phone at this price
Cool and smooth performance.. Better than m3 pro.. 50 mp camera is not bad.. Thanks poco for better experience..

After using iPhone for about 3 years now, thought to go for an Android and decided to go for this beast. Initially I was skeptical for Poco wanted to buy other Mi phones but later decided to grab Poco M4 Pro 5G.
Yes, I am satisfied after a week use.

Processor - Powerful
Ram - good memory management
Display - not repenting at all for not buying an Amoled
Battery & Charging - Just Awesome
Camera - It's better than average

Perhaps in this budget as of now this is the best. Just go for it.

Photos are good but needs more software Optimization. The bettery is good but still my 2 years old phone gives more screen on time than this.
Performance is good but software is not that good.
That's it, it is a really good smartphone.
Battery:- I am getting battery backup same as of my 2 years old smartphone in this brand new smartphone (my old smartphone also has 5000mah bettery). So not that good.
Hope we get Android 12 as soon as possible with stable software. And get updates to Android 15 with stable software. Than I will rate it 5

In terms of phone camera, this 50 mp is worse than poco x3 pro 48 mp camera. Don't expect to click wonderful pictures, this phone is not for that. It's so and so, not that bad or good either, 3.5/5.

The battery back up is pretty good, a little bit above average. There was a bit of heating issue when I started to configure the phone for the first time. But after the complete installation and updates of phone apps it cooled down, i guess it's somewhat normal.

The performance of the phone is very smooth. I bought the 6gb ram/128 rom variant. And 2gb ram can be added from rom, 6+2 ram, although the cover said 3gb ram is extendable. I guess it could increase with system update later.

I am a bit disappointed because there is no charging indicator light and the display is only 450 nits brightness. Other than that everything is good. This device is most suitable for gamers under budget and for casual users too. But it's not for people with passion for photography.

pros.5000 mAh Battery: The powerful 5000 mAh battery gives a long lasting backup and can go on for 2 days on normal use.
pros.Performance: This phone contains Helio G96 processor with 6 GB of RAM and 128 GB of internal memory which provides an outstanding performance for all the daily tasks.

cons.16.33 cm (6.43 inch) Full HD+ AMOLED Dis: The display quality is just decent enough and not upto the mark.
cons.Camera: The triple rear camera and front camera is average at this price point.
cons.Sound: The speaker quality of this phone is poor and sometimes it does not work.

summary.verdict: The POCO M4 Pro is a good pick with powerful battery and performance.
summary.Additional Information: Side mounted fingerprint sensor, Runs on MIUI 13 based on Android 11.
